name: Froggy Band Ultimate
description:
Froggy Band Ultimate is a RIBBITING cross between a Rhythm game and an Real-Time Strategy game!

Take control of the Froglin Fields marching band, but make sure not to let your amphibious band members overheat! (Based on a true story)

Game Jam submission for JDE's Mid-Summer Jam.

Made by:

Les (All art and cute froggy critters): https://twitter.com/heylezl

Luke (All code/music): https://twitter.com/meistermayo
